item.description:
All are welcome - you do NOT need to be interested in trivia to attend this meetup!

I've included a picture so it will be that much easier for y'all to find the bar. When you arrive, immediately turn to the right as you walk in the front door. Our group will be in the alcove to the right side of the entrance.

For additional information about the venue, please check out Hugh's website:
http://www.hughoneill...

Parking: there's limited parking on Pleasant Street, but if you turn down the side street just before Hugh's you'll find a free public parking lot.

See ya soon! Looking forward to coming up with a witty team name...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a Hartford Whaler's hockey jersey (white, green & blue)
item.name: Hugh O'Neill's STUMP TRIVIA
